entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of the school who secured a job for Hagrid as gamekeeper and turned a blind eye to his actions.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at the school who used his mysterious influence over Dumbledore to secure an additional post as Care of Magical Creatures teacher.

entities.name: vincent crabbe
entities.description: A fourth-year student who got a bad bite from a flobberworm during Hagrid's lessons.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: A fourth-year student who was attacked by a hippogriff and expressed hatred for Hagrid.

entities.name: hippogriff
entities.description: A creature that attacked Draco Malfoy during Hagrid's lessons.

entities.name: flobberworm
entities.description: A creature that bit Vincent Crabbe during Hagrid's lessons.
